Tie Polyline Index
Dia

NumberPoints
Type: SystemInt32
Number of 3D points defining the polyline
ZoneLength
Type: SystemDouble
Confinement Zone Length
LocationCode
Type: SystemInt32
0 - horizontal distributed, 1 - horizontal confinement zone I, 2 - horizontal confinement zone J

Return Value

Type: Int32
Returns zero if the function is successful; otherwise it returns a nonzero value.
